:: Wolfgang ::

:: Wolfgang dodges some of the shots but is hit by two of them. ::

Argh! We have to stop him! Reptilica, Bloodystrike, Perdabot, lets go! 
Dracona, you come too!

:: Wolfgang rushes down the hall untill he finnally reaches Nemisis. ::

Ok Nemisis, lets calm down. Remember, you fired the first shot. Im not trying 
to hurt you, we're part of a team. 

:: While talking, Wolfgang whispers to his virtual log. ::

"Captains log: Entry 58. Nemisis is a traitor! Zardus, if you get to this, be 
wary of Nemisis. Entry finished. "

:: Turns off log and calmly walks towards Nemisis. ::
